name: LoveBugsLoveHugs
description:
Made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #4

What's this?

This game is intended to be played with two people sharing one controller. You could also use a keyboard. You could also play it alone, in the dark, sad, but I highly recommend that you grab a friend or train an animal to play this with because it actually hurts my head to try to control two lovebugs at the same time.

What's a "Lovebug"?

Lovebugs are indigenous little creeps friends that come around every summer in the south. They're a little cute... They attach butts together, and buzz around.

Controls (Gamepad Recommended): Player1 (Purple): Left Trigger/Left CTRL to Dash. Left Stick/"A","D" to move. Player2 (Green): Right Trigger/Right CTRL to Dash. Right Stick/Arrow Keys to move.

This was my first game made entirely with C#, so I'm pretty hyped about that <3
